attributes.action: Ensure that petitions on this website are grammatically correct and spelt properly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At a time when the English language is under such threat in our country, and where in some local areas, like parts of Lincolnshire and Norfolk, English speakers now feel in a minority, it worries me to find so many petitions on this site whose writers are obviously unaware of the rules of English grammar and spelling. I would have imagined that using a spell check or grammar check should have been expected before addressing the Prime Minister.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
